title: Risk
creator_credit: John Haggarty, James Carr and World Wide Pictures
brief_description: An insurance broker, with his knowledge of his client’s activities, can assess all potential situations and knows where to place the risk at the most economic premium. Told in story form, this explains the work of a Broker in Britain and illustrates his involvement with individuals and industries.
creator_credit_for_label: John Haggarty, James Carr and World Wide Pictures
